ygData.subject: Re: me again hehe, (tomahawk 1h slasher)
ygData.msgSnippet: The whips are found on tentacle terrors. Tentacle terrors range from the high teens up to the low twenties in level. They can be found in Najena and Unrest.
ygData.messageBody:
The whips are found on tentacle terrors. Tentacle terrors range from the
high teens up to the low twenties in level. They can be found in Najena and
Unrest. (This is why I just broke down and bought one since the bard is
only 10th level.)

I got mine in Greater Faydark (not far from Unrest).

Bandor, Barbarian Warrior








anonymaste@... on 05/17/99 10:43:47 AM

slasher)









From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>

I usually hang around in freeport.
Where would I go to aquire this whip?
I havent seen it on /auc so i guess the price would be kinda nasty there.
Since I like exploring I have no problem in venturing to
other areas...........and gettin killed

vashi


>From: chlebek@...
>
>
>
>The Polished Granite Tomahawk is hard to come by. People have been
offering >200pp for one. Now the whip you speak of is no more expensive
than a store >bought weapon (non-rusty). I got one for my bard for 25pp a
while back and >a friend got one for 12pp. The lifetap only kicks in about
every other >fight on average.
>
>Bandor, Barbarian Warrior
